title: Fat slab serif typeface on Niklaus Troxler poster
content:
Hello there

Any guess on that bold slab serif typeface?

Thank you so much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803153634im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Troxler-01_5402.jpg)
author: M Magazine

comments.content: I see [Beton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803153634/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/beton) Extra Bold by Heinrich Jost.
